subject: Re: [junit] Re: How to create test case to test the Android apk use the JUnit
msgSnippet: Hi David Saff, So have to know whether java classes to read out of an Android apk file at all. (Include the *.java, source, layout...etc files) Then we can
messageBody:
Hi David Saff,

So have to know whether java classes to read out of an Android apk file at all. (Include the *.java, source, layout...etc files)
Then we can create JUnit project to test apk file via the JUnit TestCase, right?

See the attach files apk example. (I also attach the source code for this apk file)
How to create the JUnit project to test the attach apk file, if I know whether can be read.
Can be provide the steps or source code to reference.

Thank you for your help.

Regards,
Kent Wang







--- In junit@yahoogroups. com, David Saff <david@...> wrote:
>
> sober60kimo,
>
> Sounds like you have a hard task ahead of you. Do you know whether
> java classes can be read out of an apk file at all?
>
> David Saff
>
> On Wed, Aug 19, 2009 at 8:50 PM, sober60kimo< sober60kimo@ ...> wrote:
> > Hi,
> >
> > I only have an Anroid apk then want to create JUnit test case to test.
> > How to create test case of JUnit project to test the it?
> > Or can't use in only apk file to test, must have the source code of this file?
> >
> > Thanks,
> >
